text: Arjuna River is a river flowing in the Virudhunagar district of the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is a sacred river which formed during the period of Pandavas. Arjuna, one of the five Pandavas, rise this river to worship lord Shiva.There is large Shiva temple named Kasi Viswanatha Temple on the side of this river. == References == Category:Rivers of Tamil Nadu
title: Arjuna River
